message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was really hoping to get it for around $100. Can you meet me at $100?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I can meet you at $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I was really hoping to get it for $102. Can you meet me at $102?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I can meet you at $107, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I'm still hoping to get it for a bit cheaper. Can you meet me at $105?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $106, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
